message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $120. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to $110. Would that work for you?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking $85 would be a more reasonable price. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
